name: Countdown Timer for WordPress Block Editor
author: Flickdevs

sections.description:
Add a Flip Countdown Timer for your WordPress block editor(Gutenberg).

For an accurate timer that you can use for your Website/Blog/Particular offer/Landing Page.

It can help you count down to any special event or an sell offer.

Demo

Countdown timer for new WordPress block editor

Try Countdown Timer Pro, the Best countdown timer for WordPress block editor(Gutenberg), for only $4.99

Countdown Timer Pro Create a sense of urgency to drive sales or conversions. Perfect for flash sales, event pages, special promotions, birthdays, weddings, one time offer, and more.

Countdown Timer Pro Features

  • Cookie based Timer
  • Resart Timer after Specific Time/ Repeat timer
  • Hide timer after expire
  • Posts / Pages Countdown Timer
  • No coding skill required
  • Fully Customizable
  • Fully Responsive
  • Multiple countdown timer on same pages

Future plan

Multiple styles for countdown timer

Technical Support

We’re active for any support issues and feature suggestions. You can post on our support forum here: support forum

Want to create custom Blocks for your WordPress website?

Feel free to contact us and we will create it for you ðŸ™‚
sections.installation:
How to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress

1.0.5
